English: a skirt with green flowers on it
an alien with a green face
a woman with a green coat
a girl with a green dress
a building with a green roof
a cup made from green glass
a book with a green cover
a child with a green shirt
a pineapple with a green top
An emerald is a green gemstone.
The roses are in the green vase.
Hungarian: A rózsák a zöld vázában vannak.

Finnish: Autot ajavat, kun valo on vihreä.
English: The cars drive when the light is green.
Hungarian: Az autók mennek, amikor a lámpa zöld.

English: I follow the road to the green valley.
Hungarian: Követem az utat a zöld völgybe.
A természet zöldnek és szépnek tűnik.

English: The water of the creek turned green.

Finnish: Vihreiden oliivien maku on hieman katkera.
English: The taste of the green olives is a bit bitter.
Hungarian: A zöld olívák íze kissé kesernyés.

English: Now there is a demand for greener products.
Hungarian: Most nagy a kereslet a zöldebb termékekre.

English: Nuclear power is accepted as green energy.
Switch your household to green electricity!
The Greens want to save the environment.
Hungarian: A Zöldek meg akarják menteni a környezetet.

English: The election result was disappointing for the Greens.
Hungarian: A választási eredmény csalódás volt a Zöldeknek.
A zöld tea természetesen tartalmaz koffeint.

English: Many have been disappointed with the Greens.
The government gave the green light to travel.
Hungarian: A kormány zöld utat adott az utazásnak.

English: I did it some time in my green youth.
Ari is inexperienced in the professional field.
Ari is very good at gardening and his plants grow well.
Hungarian: Ari igazi kertész (minden növénye szépen nő).
